SELECT 구직번호 AS jobNumber, 상담사 AS counselor, 상담사_아이디 AS counselorId, 참여자 AS participant, 성별 AS gender, 생년월일 AS birthDate, 주소 AS address, 학교명 AS schoolName, 전공 AS major, 희망직무 AS desiredJob, 경력 AS career, 나이 AS age, 자격증 AS certificate, IIF(희망연봉 <= 0,'회사내규에 따름',CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),희망연봉)) AS desiredSalary, 이메일 AS email, 고유번호 AS uniqueNumber FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY 구직번호 DESC) AS RowNum, 구직번호, 상담사, 상담사_아이디, 참여자, 성별, 생년월일, 주소, 학교명, 전공, 희망직무, 경력, 나이, 자격증, 희망연봉, 이메일, 고유번호 FROM EXTERNALPARTICIPANT
) AS SUB_QUERY WHERE SUB_QUERY.RowNum>#{startPage} AND #{endPage} >= SUB_QUERY.RowNum
SELECT COUNT(구직번호) AS totalCount FROM EXTERNALPARTICIPANT

SELECT 구직번호 AS jobNumber, 상담사 AS counselor, 상담사_아이디 AS counselorId, 참여자 AS participant, 성별 AS gender, 생년월일 AS birthDate, 주소 AS address, 학교명 AS schoolName, 전공 AS major, 희망직무 AS desiredJob, 경력 AS career, 나이 AS age, 자격증 AS certificate, IIF(희망연봉 <= 0,'회사내규에 따름',CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),희망연봉)) AS desiredSalary, 이메일 AS email, 고유번호 AS uniqueNumber, 상세정보 AS placementDetail FROM dbo.EXTERNALPARTICIPANT WHERE 구직번호 = #{jobNumber}
